title: Google Mirror
description: Interacts with Glass users via the timeline.

mirror_accounts_insert.title: Inserts a new account for a user
mirror_accounts_insert.description: Inserts a new account for a user

mirror_contacts_list.title: Retrieves a list of contacts for the authenticated user.
mirror_contacts_list.description: Retrieves a list of contacts for the authenticated user.

mirror_contacts_get.title: Gets a single contact by ID.
mirror_contacts_get.description: Gets a single contact by ID.

mirror_contacts_patch.title: Updates a contact in place. This method supports patch semantics.
mirror_contacts_patch.description: Updates a contact in place. This method supports patch semantics.

mirror_locations_list.title: Retrieves a list of locations for the user.
mirror_locations_list.description: Retrieves a list of locations for the user.

mirror_locations_get.title: Gets a single location by ID.
mirror_locations_get.description: Gets a single location by ID.

mirror_settings_get.title: Gets a single setting by ID.
mirror_settings_get.description: Gets a single setting by ID.

mirror_subscriptions_list.title: Retrieves a list of subscriptions for the authenticated user and service.
mirror_subscriptions_list.description: Retrieves a list of subscriptions for the authenticated user and service.

mirror_subscriptions_update.title: Updates an existing subscription in place.
mirror_subscriptions_update.description: Updates an existing subscription in place.

mirror_timeline_list.title: Retrieves a list of timeline items for the authenticated user.
mirror_timeline_list.description: Retrieves a list of timeline items for the authenticated user.

mirror_timeline_insert.title: Inserts a new item into the timeline.
mirror_timeline_insert.description: Inserts a new item into the timeline.

mirror_timeline_get.title: Gets a single timeline item by ID.
mirror_timeline_get.description: Gets a single timeline item by ID.

mirror_timeline_patch.title: Updates a timeline item in place. This method supports patch semantics.
mirror_timeline_patch.description: Updates a timeline item in place. This method supports patch semantics.

mirror_timeline_update.title: Updates a timeline item in place.
mirror_timeline_update.description: Updates a timeline item in place.

mirror_timeline_attachments_list.title: Returns a list of attachments for a timeline item.
mirror_timeline_attachments_list.description: Returns a list of attachments for a timeline item.

mirror_timeline_attachments_insert.title: Adds a new attachment to a timeline item.
mirror_timeline_attachments_insert.description: Adds a new attachment to a timeline item.

mirror_timeline_attachments_delete.title: Deletes an attachment from a timeline item.
mirror_timeline_attachments_delete.description: Deletes an attachment from a timeline item.

mirror_timeline_attachments_get.title: Retrieves an attachment on a timeline item by item ID and attachment ID.
mirror_timeline_attachments_get.description: Retrieves an attachment on a timeline item by item ID and attachment ID.
